title: Partying like it's 1999 - wins that is... Any rioter up for a game?

replies.body: Let me know when you're free!

I'm here! wondering if you are?

I sent an invite to you!
Ohhhh Kristari and Katey sitting in a tree...P-L-A-Y-I-N-G...first comes blood...then comes more damage...then comes the 2000th win in a baby carriage.

I've been trying to get a Rioter for my 1000th win as well. 

A SPECIFIC ONE I guess, but still. I'm having troubles too. I'm assuming with pre-season going on, most of them are rather busy.
I thought I put deodorant on today :(
